name: Octaipipe ACE is updated for an existing customer
title: Octaipipe ACE is updated for an existing customer

testSteps.description: Given Como sees that "DC" has a "valid" licence
Then Como sees that "DC" has the "latest" version of Ace installed

children.description: Como ensures that data in table for DC in column Ace Version does equal "latest"

exception.message:
Expected data in table for DC in column Ace Version to equal "latest"

Expectation: equals('latest')

Expected string:    latest
Received undefined

    at /home/runner/work/OPtest/OPtest/features/step-definitions/deployment.steps.ts:15:12

userStory.narrative:
The OctaiPipe platform (http://app.ace.octaipipe.ai) is used by the
commercial team to manage deployments on customer sites.

actors.name: Como
can: ScheduleWork { scheduler: { clock: { timeAdjustment: { milliseconds: 0 } }, interactionTimeout: { milliseconds: 5000 } } }
CallAnApi { baseURL: "http://127.0.0.1:3000/", headers: { common: { Accept: "application/json, text/plain, */*" } }, timeout: 10000 }
